Html:
Hi there, im relative new to phpexcel.

I think I understood everything so far, i can read cells from sheets and use their values.
My goal is to have a converter, input Excel2007, output some csv like.

Whenever i get a file that contains data and a link to external data source, i get cell values like this:

=[1]!NF($E5,"Adress")

As soon as i remove the data source (in Excel) i have a proper result.
Is there any way to strip this?

Hope I read everything here in the board, nobody seems to have that problem or im blind :)
